Title: Running
Writer: Sean Gray (teleplay), Will Smith (teleplay), Armando Iannucci (story), Sean Gray (story), Will Smith (story), Armando Iannucci (creator)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: Undeterred by a message that POTUS wants Selina to limit her public appearances, the Veep continues her plans. Dan attempts to play both sides of the Selina/Danny Chung rivalry.
